How to play:

Send a payment of 0.01 BTC to 16DUQRxWUB65vcotfyVZCGAqActPtdrUvE then send an email to containing the address that you made the payment with. We will match the address you provide with the address that made the payment for verification.

F.A.Q.

  • What is the Onion Lotto?
  • The Onion Lotto is a place for everyone to pitch in and make the BitCoin worth more again while awarding people with monetary prizes.
  • How much can I win?
  • You can win up to 99.9% of the total spent on tickets from every user. We keep 0.1% of the coins so we can offer better services and more games in the future with better hosting.
  • How are the winners selected?
  • One of the members of our team has made a randomizing program that will select one of the addresses that purchased a ticket and give them a percentage of the total spent on tickets. It will do it up to 3 times, only leaving 0.1% of the total spent on tickets.
  • How many tickets can I buy?
  • You can buy as many as you'd like, but make sure you do it in separate transactions or it will not count as more than 1 purchase in our system.
  • Is it secure?
  • No names or personal information are taken or released.
  • How will I know if I won?
  • You will recieve a significant amount of BTC in your wallet, and we will send you an email with the amount won.
  • Why do you do this?
  • We do this so we can help stimulate the BitCoin economy while helping our beloved friends around the world make some easy money.
